oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of former Nashville Mayor Ben West at his desk, August 1958
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of former Nashville Mayor Ben West at his desk in August 1958. Ben West served as Mayor of Nashville from 1951-1963.
